name: MagicofGold
description: Magic of Gold is a Play win project. It combines the world of NFT and the game. Magic is a Play to Earn NFT tactical RPG built on the Binance Smart Chain platform. The game features an exquisite collection of NFT Heroes and Items waiting for players to collect. The token aims to be a physically available metaverse project for investors.Magic is a metaverse play to earn game project that will also be the Nft marketplace on the BSC network.
